page.title: 09TRADE FACILITIES
page.content: In Withernwick there are only two shops now - the Butchers and the Post Office which is also a general store. There are vans that come to the village selling fish,fruit and vegetables, bread and cakes, and ice-cream. The Bread, Fish, Fruit and vegetable vans come once a week, The lce-cream van comes most evenings. In New Ellerby there is also a Post-Office-General Store. Many people in Withernwick, as well as using the village shop, go shopping for food to the bigger supermarkets in Hull and Hornsea. We found that the most used supermarkets were Asda and Jacksons Grandways.
